attributes.action: legalise Road Rage against people who paint their car wheels Pink or other silly colours.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I put it to the government that a Public Order offense is commited by anyone who buys a "My First Paint Kit" or any other silly colour paint kit, to paint their cars alloy wheels or wheel trims ANY bright distracting colour like pink, should be issued a rectification order or be subjected to public humiliation. Such colours are distracting an a potential hazard to road users.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
